name: The Great Pie Heist
description: Pie's gone missing!|Someone in town has taken Mrs. Berry's award-winning blueberry pie. It's up to you to follow the crumbs and solve this tasty mystery!

text: Adventurer! My blueberry pie is gone!
I was going to enter it in the competition tomorrow!
Find it and there's a slice in it for you.
Following the trail of pie crumbs, you stumble upon a suspicious-looking squirrel.
It seems to be enjoying... a blueberry?
Okay, okay! I took the pie! But it was for a good cause!
There's a party in the tree tonight. Want to join?
completedText: Return the pie... or party first?

text: You brought it back! Thank you, dear!
Now, about that slice I promised...

popup.title: Quest completed!
popup.text: @green@You have cracked @crimson@The Great Pie Heist@green@. Enjoy your well-deserved slice of pie!
